meanings.sent1: I won a million dollars in the lottery.
meanings.sent2: The company produced a million units of the new product.
meanings.sent3: It would take a million years to count to a million!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a million suns.
meanings.sent5: The field of stars looked like a million tiny diamonds in the sky.

meanings.definition: A very large number or amount.
meanings.sent1: There were a million people at the concert.
meanings.sent2: She had a million things to do before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a million bucks after a good night's sleep.
meanings.sent4: The news spread like wildfire through a million whispers.
meanings.sent5: The forest was filled with a million shades of green in the spring.
